name: trello_update_card
description: Update a Trello card's title, description, or due date.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New card title (leave empty to keep current)

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: New description (leave empty to keep current)

parameters.name: due_date
parameters.description: New due date in ISO format or 'null' to remove (leave empty to keep current)

steps.code: const params = new URLSearchParams(); const name = `{{name}}`; if (name) params.set('name', name); const desc = `{{description}}`; if (desc) params.set('desc', desc); const due = `{{due_date}}`; if (due === 'null') params.set('due', ''); else if (due) params.set('due', due); if ([...params].length === 0) return { success: false, message: 'No fields to update' }; const resp = await fetch('/1/cards/{{card_id}}?' + params.toString(), { method: 'PUT', credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Update failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const card = await resp.json(); return { success: true, id: card.id, name: card.name, url: card.shortUrl || card.url }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Update card via Trello API
